short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lazy people are more than welcome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension just parses the GitHub pull request title, detect if a JIRA ticket id is present on it enclosed with brackets and if so it adds a piece of cake to go from GitHub to the related JIRA ticket page.
